legalName.title: Legal Name
legalName.description: Enter the name that is legally registered to your organization.
legalName.example: Biological and Chemical Data Management Office

name.title: Common Name
name.description: Enter the name commonly used to refer to your organization.

url.title: URL or DOI URL
url.description: Enter the organization's URL or DOI URL.

description.title: Description
description.description: Describe your organization, e.g., its mission, goals, etc.
description.example: The BCO-DMO resource catalog offers free and open access to publicly funded research products whose field of study are biological and chemical oceanography.

category.title: Field(s) of Study
category.description: Enter your organization field(s) of study.

sameAs.title: Social Media URLs
sameAs.description: Enter links to your organization social media pages, e.g., Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.

contactPoint.title: Contact
contactPoint.description: Provide information about the organization's contact(s), which may be an individual and/or a department within the organization.

name.title: Name
name.description: Enter the contact name, which may be that of either an individual or a department within the organization.

email.title: Email
email.description: Provide an email address for this organizational contact.

url.title: URL
url.description: Provide a URL to your organization's web pages that provide information about this contact.

contactType.title: Contact Role
contactType.description: Enter the role fulfilled by this contact within the organization.

streetAddress.title: Street
streetAddress.description: Enter the street address used for this organizational postal address.
streetAddress.example: WHOI, MS#36, Shiverick House 11 School St.

addressLocality.title: City
addressLocality.description: Enter the city used for this organizational postal address.

addressRegion.title: State
addressRegion.description: Enter the state used for this organizational postal address.

postalCode.title: ZIP Code
postalCode.description: Enter the ZIP code used for this organizational postal address.

addressCountry.title: Country
addressCountry.description: Enter the country used for this organizational postal address.

foundingDate.title: Inception Date
foundingDate.description: Provide the date on which your organization was founded.

logo.title: Logo
logo.description: Logo refers to the symbol or graphical design adopted by your organization to readily identify it.

url.title: Logo URL
url.description: Provide a link to the image file containing your organization's logo.

parentOrganization.title: Parent Organizations
parentOrganization.description: A Parent Organization is that part of an organization that coordinates, supervises, or exercises control over policy, fund-raising, and expenditures, or assists or advises one or more chapters, branches, or affiliates.

legalName.title: Legal Name
legalName.description: Enter the name that is legally registered to this parent organization

name.title: Common Name
name.description: Enter the name commonly used to refer to this parent organization.

url.title: Parent Org URL
url.description: Enter a link to this parent organization's web site.

address.title: Street
address.description: Enter this parent organization's entire postal address.

streetAddress.title: Street
streetAddress.description: Enter the street address used in this parent organization's postal address.

addressLocality.title: City
addressLocality.description: Enter the city used in this parent organization's postal address.

addressRegion.title: State
addressRegion.description: Enter the state used in this parent organization's postal address.

postalCode.title: ZIP Code
postalCode.description: Enter the ZIP code used in this parent organization's postal address.

addressCountry.title: Country
addressCountry.description: Enter the country used in this parent organization's postal address.

memberOf.title: Associations
memberOf.description: Associations can be any outside partners that your organization works with, including programs with which your organization is affiliated or of which your organization is a member.

programName.title: Name
programName.description: Enter the name of this association.

hostingOrganization.title: Hosting Organization
hostingOrganization.description: Provide information about this association's hosting organization.

name.title: Host Org Name
name.description: Enter the name of this association's hosting organization.

url.title: Hosting Org URL
url.description: Enter a link to this hosting organization's web site.

funder.title: Funding Agencies
funder.description: Provide information about agencies that fund your organization.

legalName.title: Legal Name
legalName.description: Enter the name that is legally registered to this funding agency.

name.title: Common Name
name.description: Enter the name commonly used to refer to this funding agency.

url.title: Funding Agency URL
url.description: Enter a link to this funding agency's web site.

value.title: Funding Agency DOI
value.description: Enter the Digital Object Identifier, or DOI, used by the funding agency.

url.title: Funding Agency DOI URL
url.description: DOI URL is a DOI in URL form. Enter a link to the DOI.

publishingPrinciples.title: Publishing
publishingPrinciples.description: Provide information about the digital documents published by your organization.

name.title: Common Name
name.description: Enter the name commonly used to refer to this document.

url.title: URL
url.description: Enter a link to where this document can be found online.

fileFormat.title: File Type
fileFormat.description: Provide the file type for this document.
